title: Length Constraint
description: Specifies a length constraint as either a fixed non-negative integer or an object defining a minimum and/or maximum length.

oneOf.description: A fixed non-negative integer representing the exact length.
An object specifying a range with minimum and/or maximum non-negative integer values.

minimum.description: The minimum non-negative integer length. Must be less than or equal to maximum if maximum is present.

maximum.description: The maximum non-negative integer length. Must be greater than or equal to minimum if minimum is present.
